pullrequest.title: Added wrapper around root SDF for an SDF element

content.raw:
The problem was that I had an old version of math3 installed, therefore I thought it should be there. The cmake script doesn't install the math3 headers, which I was wrongly assuming:

`set (INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_POSTFIX "ignition/${IGN_PROJECT_NAME}${PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION}")`

Using tag ignition-math\_3.2.0 it now compiles.

I removed the requirement for math4 again. Sorry for the confusion.
content.html:
The problem was that I had an old version of math3 installed, therefore I thought it should be there. The cmake script doesn't install the math3 headers, which I was wrongly assuming:

set (INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_POSTFIX "ignition/${IGN_PROJECT_NAME}${PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION}")

Using tag ignition-math_3.2.0 it now compiles.

I removed the requirement for math4 again. Sorry for the confusion.
